description: Enjoy radiant skin with COVERGIRL Vitalist Go Glow Glotion. Infused with vitamins E, B3 and B5, this lightweight moisturizer with light-reflecting pigments gives your skin a naturally hydrated luminous glow. Go Glow Glotion is available in two shades: light and bronze.
